name: I Can See You (itch)
description:
Simplistic game of choice in a sci-fi setting with visual and audio reference. Playable by the visually impaired, but can be enjoyed by anyone. This game was made using Twine and Unity and was designed for easy interaction with an expandable narrative. 

Designed and developed by Paul Harden, Chris VanTassel, Stephen Nester & Sara Harden. Phardware 2020.
